classDiagram
%% This whole line is a comment classDiagram class Shape <<interface>>
class Shape{
    <<interface>>
    noOfVertices
    draw()
}
---
┌───────────────┐     
│ <<interface>> │     
│     Shape     │     
├───────────────┤     
│ noOfVertices  │     
├───────────────┤     
│ draw()        │     
└───────────────┘
